function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Proximity economy-based urban agenda may lead to increased proximity and contact between individuals, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission.","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases within urban environments, leading to public health crises and economic disruptions.","Mitigation":"Implementation of robust public health measures, including hygiene protocols, vaccination campaigns, and disease surveillance systems to minimize the risk of disease transmission.","Technologies":"Use of contact tracing apps, crowd monitoring systems, and health screening technologies to identify and contain outbreaks.","People":"Residents, workers, and visitors within urban environments. Particularly vulnerable populations such as the elderly and immunocompromised individuals.","Owner":"Local governments, public health authorities, urban planners, and community organizations."}]}
